properties.headline: Tornado Watch until 7:00 PM CDT for Central Cook County
properties.description:
* WHAT...Conditions are favorable for the development of tornadoes in and close to the watch area.

* WHERE...Central Cook County.

* WHEN...Until 7:00 PM CDT.

* IMPACTS...Tornadoes can cause injury and property damage. Remain alert for warnings and have a plan to move to safe shelter.
properties.instruction: Review your tornado safety plan, stay tuned to local weather updates, and be prepared to take action if a warning is issued.

properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning until 8:00 PM CDT for Central Cook County â€” PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago IL has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
  Central Cook County.

* Until 8:00 PM CDT.

* At 7:15 PM CDT, a large and potentially dangerous severe thunderstorm was located near downtown Chicago, moving east at 25 mph.

  THIS IS A PARTICULARLY DANGEROUS SITUATION. TAKE COVER NOW!

  HAZARD...Damaging wind gusts up to 80 mph, very large hail up to 2 inches, and dangerous lightning.

  SOURCE...Emergency management confirmed reports of wind damage.

  IMPACT...You are in a life-threatening situation. Flying debris may cause injury. Mobile homes may be destroyed. Significant damage to homes, businesses, and vehicles is likely.

* The storm will be near...
  Oak Brook, Cicero, Berwyn, and surrounding areas around 7:30 PM CDT.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS...

Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
properties.instruction: Seek shelter immediately. Move to a basement or interior room. Avoid windows and protect yourself from flying debris.
